title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing jihad in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing jihad in a dream: Jihad comes from effort and effort to obtain a specific thing. It was known at the time of the emergence of Islam that jihad was fighting the people of Quraysh and standing before them with all strength and courage to defend the Islamic religion, and there is also jihad for the sake of God Almighty in which some. groups. We join hands and form a large team to stand against the enemies of Islam, and jihad has conditions that must be met, the first message, and this means that jihad is rational, because jihad is not permissible for a mentally ill child. Interpretation of a dream about jihad according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing jihad in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a good position in his work. Whoever sees in a dream that he is fighting and defeating enemies will overcome all the difficulties he is going through. Seeing victory in jihad is evidence of the many gains that he will achieve. Major. Whoever seeks jihad on the nipple is the one who strives to achieve his goals. Whoever sees in a dream that enemies are killed in jihad, it is nourishment and kindness. And whoever follows the path of jihad in a dream, this indicates goodness and the path to guidance. Whoever dreams of being killed in jihad will be happy and rejoicing. Interpretation of a dream about jihad According to Al-Nabulsi, seeing someone in a dream trying to achieve this for the sake of God indicates the scope of this livelihood. Seeing someone in a dream fighting and getting rid of infidels is evidence of plunder and victory over enemies. Seeing someone emerging from invaders is a sign that he is walking on the path of goodness and going to God. If one dreams that he is going to God, then this vision is a sign of the good and great position that the pioneer will have. Seeing someone participating in the opening up of countries, this indicates changing his life for the better and opening up to the world in the life of the visionary. Jihad in a dream can be an indicator To provide sustenance and kindness. Interpretation of a dream about jihad for a man. A man who dreams of fighting and jihad is one who cuts ties with one another. By seeing a person going out for jihad and defeating enemies, he will attain a great victory and get rid of the enemies present in his life. And whoever believes that he has been victorious in jihad and conquest, it is a sign of achieving goals. Vision A man in a dream fights for the sake of God and fights in the affairs of his life and obtains a living. If he sees that he jihad and escaped from the battle, this is evidence of his irresponsibility. Interpretation of a dream about jihad for a married womanIf a married woman sees that she was killed in combat, she will be happy and joyful. If you see people They go out for jihad, as this is a sign of their victory and freedom from enemies. Interpretation of a dream about jihad for single people. If a girl believes that she is fighting infidels and polytheists, this indicates that she is religious and based on the commandments of God. Seeing victory over infidels indicates that she has achieved her desires and success in her life. Jihad can indicate Her marriage to a man of courage, strength, and noble characteristics. Seeing defeat in war and jihad may indicate some failures in her life and obstacles in her path.

title: Interpretation of fighting and fighting in a dream: Seeing a fight or fighting in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a quarrel for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a married man and a single young man, the meaning of disagreement, turmoil, and quarreling with the beloved husband, father, brother, mother, consensual reconciliation, contemporary to the troubled one, and more about Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of disagreement in a dream. Seeing disagreements and quarrels in a dream means Unhappiness and the emergence of quarrels, followed by sharp verbal disputes. As for the girl, this dream portends the occurrence of important events that have bad results together. This portends the separation of the married woman from her husband or the continuation of disagreements and quarrels between them. If you hear two brothers arguing, this indicates the loss of trade and a failed business. Seeing a quarrel in a dream It means bad luck, loss in business, and an unhappy life. A quarrel or quarrel with father and mother expresses the dreamer’s need for more care and attention. Whenever the fight with them becomes more intense or the violence intensifies, an overwhelming love appears, such violence and beatings. If a quarrel occurs in a dream with parents, this interpretively means benefit or A benefit that the dreamer will derive from them or one of them. A violent quarrel with brothers also expresses a strong relationship between them, and an argument with brothers in a dream is interpreted as reconciliation and understanding. If you see in your dream that you are in a fierce fight with your boyfriend or girlfriend, this is a very good interpretation, even if Fighting broke out between fists or beatings, because the dream expresses an agreement between you or a desire. Each side to protect and help the other. If there is a dispute between you in wakefulness, the dream or dream expresses a close peace, because the dream of fighting between friends and loved ones is one of the visions that is interpreted in the opposite way, as is the dream. Of beating. If someone sees in a dream that he is arguing or quarreling with his deceased mother or father, this is his interpretation of not following their path or following a path in life other than the path that satisfies him. Quarrel with deceased parents in a dream has negative connotations, so the dreamer must re He examined himself on many issues and searched for his mistakes and tried to correct or overcome them every time. Because a dream in this direction is a psychological message that must be carefully considered and understood correctly. The meaning of anger and strife in a dream. It is a vision that portends general goodness and good fortune, and announces the ability of insight to facilitate his affairs for the better. His work clearly stabilized, brought him closer to his loved ones, and freed him from his enemies and competitors. , creating true friendships, life will bring him closer to the people who influence his life with happiness, kindness, and love. A killer in a dream. The interpretation of this dream is exactly the opposite, as it expresses a good period of time with his loved ones and acquaintances, his ability to form a strong relationship of love and friendship with them, and his strong attachment to friends New. He expresses that he spends his life with people who seem to him to have good intentions, peace, tenderness, and mercy. It also expresses that even though they spend happy times together, when he goes through any adversity, these people will be his primary support. Disagreement and reconciliation in a dream It is a vision that does not bode well at all, as it portends increasing enemies and competitors for the vision and passage.

title: Interpretation of something coming out of my nose in a dream: I dreamed that something came out of my nose in a dream

preview.html: Seeing something coming out of the mouth that we see in different forms, such as the secretion of green mucus or a yellow, white or black liquid, the discharge of flies, contaminated blood, smoke, thread, hair, ropes, worms, and pus for the unmarried woman, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, For the man, by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and more detailed interpretations in the appendix to the topic below. Interpretation of something coming out of the nose in a dream: The girl who sees that mucus is coming out of her nose forcefully, this is her interpretation of the ease of searching and spending. Every liquid or substance that comes out of the nose represents money except blood. Whoever sees a fly or Something similar coming out of his nose indicates that a child will be born to him. Whoever dreams: that mucus is coming out of his nose, then this indicates that he will benefit from it, Glory be to Him. And whoever sees: that he said at an intersection that blood came out of my nose, then this is an incident of money, and if he says that it came out, then the money is gone. Whoever dreams: that an animal or a bird comes out of his nose, this indicates that if he has an animal, he will give birth. Whoever sees that he stepped on the ground, a daughter will be born to him. Whoever sees: that he stepped on and an animal or bird came out of his nose, he struck a boy on both sides of what that bird attributed to him. If a cat comes out of his nose, it is a boy and a boy. A thief, and if it is a dove, then it is a crazy girl, and the mucus is a warning of an illness or his illness. Whoever dreams: that he clings, and what he hates comes out of him, then he is a boy with no good in him, and if he is loved, then the suitable boy is fair. Whoever dreams: he has a nosebleed and blood pours on If you dream of a bleeding nose, this means that a catastrophe will happen to the person who sees the dream. Whoever sees blood flowing from his nose and believes that the blood will benefit him well, indicates that the dreamer will gain a benefit or be harmed by the president’s money. Or from a high-ranking person. Whoever sees in a dream that someone hits him on the nose and makes him bleed, this indicates that the enemy is waiting for the fortuneteller to bring him conspiracies, harm, and damage. Hair that comes out of the nose indicates that harm is coming out for you, so perhaps magic or fatigue will leave you. Threads coming out Or hair is one of the disturbing dreams and its interpretation is mainly related to the psychological state of the viewer, as well as whether the thread or hair has come out completely or part of it remains, with the exception of the color of the thread. Seeing hair or thread coming out in a dream means a long life. Hair or thread coming out of the mouth is interpreted as Removing stress and recovering from whatever discomfort or envy the dreamer may have experienced. In the event that it is not possible to remove it from the mouth or remove only part of it, the injury must be removed. Whoever dreams that a mouse has come out of his nose or from his penis, then he will have a bad daughter, and this It will not benefit her, and if it comes out of his back, a woman will come out of it. There is no good in it. Whoever dreams of thick blood coming out of his nose if his wife is pregnant, this indicates a miscarriage of the fetus. Whoever dreams of blood coming out of the nose of someone he knows, this indicates great calamity or distress that befalls the person whose nose is bleeding. Whoever dreams: that nasal dirt may It increased, then he hated it, and if he sees that he has cleansed it, then it is upon him. Seeing a mucous crust on the nose indicates problems and administrative obstacles. Whoever sees in a dream his nose being cut off and flies or something similar coming out of it.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing frogs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Frogs in a dream Frogs are creatures that people do not like and do not prefer to encounter or see in reality. What are their different meanings in a dream? Interpretation of seeing frogs in a dream. What is the interpretation of frogs in a dream? Some dream interpreters claim that seeing frogs in a dream is one of those visions that heralds It is good at times, but it shows the dreamer that he will be exposed to pressure and harm at other times. A pregnant woman who sees a frog in her dream is a happy dream, especially if this frog is green, because it indicates that the birth will be easy and will be natural, God willing. As for the unmarried woman who She sees a black frog, it is one of the bad things that predicts the presence of a naughty man in her life and she must be very careful of him. What is the interpretation of frogs in Al-Osaimi’s dream? Imam Al-Osaimi believes that if a frog appears in a married woman’s dream, this means that there is a problem in this woman’s life and she is trying to Hiding them and not showing them to people. As for a man seeing frogs, it indicates that he has multiple relationships with girls, which will harm his reputation if the matter is revealed. This vision comes as a warning from God. If someone sees frog eggs in a dream, this indicates the presence of a large number of opportunities in that person’s life. The person must use them correctly and not let his opportunities go to waste. What is the interpretation of frogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin confirms that a frog in a dream is a person who wants to worship God Almighty, the Best of servants, and does not care about worldly matters. Seeing frogs in a dream means that the dreamer He has good relationships with his family, family and friends and everyone loves to see him and go out with him. Moreover, talking to this person puts people at ease. As for catching frogs in a dream, it is not a good vision because it shows the extent of the injustice that the dreamer is suffering from in his life and the resulting harm. A great psychological sign. If a person sees that he is trying to catch a frog in his dream, this confirms that he is dealing with a good and righteous person in his normal life and he must approach this person because it will benefit him. The person who sees himself eating a frog in a dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams that explain Direct benefits to the person, and this benefit may come from his family or friends, as well as from his neighbors. I know more than 2000 interpretations of Ibn Sirin, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, from Google. What is the interpretation of frogs in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream? Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the presence of frogs inside the dreamer’s house in his dream indicates bad conditions. The materialism of the people of that house indicates their poverty. If a married woman sees that there is a frog trying to attack her, this indicates that there is another woman in this woman’s life who is trying to harm her and keep her away from her husband. Imam Al-Sadiq confirms that seeing a pregnant woman carrying frog eggs in a dream means that she will give birth. Twins, and God knows best. Seeing frogs may indicate the presence of evil in the dreamer’s life and the attempt of some to ruin his affairs with magic and evil, so he seeks God’s help and asks for help. If a person sees that he is talking to frogs in a dream, this indicates that benefit and sustenance will come from the dreamer. Frogs

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing jihad in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing jihad in a dream: Jihad comes from effort and effort to obtain a specific thing. It was known at the time of the emergence of Islam that jihad was fighting the people of Quraysh and standing before them with all strength and courage to defend the Islamic religion, and there is also jihad for the sake of God Almighty in which some. groups. We join hands and form a large team to stand against the enemies of Islam, and jihad has conditions that must be met, the first message, and this means that jihad is rational, because jihad is not permissible for a mentally ill child. Interpretation of a dream about jihad according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing jihad in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a good position in his work. Whoever sees in a dream that he is fighting and defeating enemies will overcome all the difficulties he is going through. Seeing victory in jihad is evidence of the many gains that he will achieve. Major. Whoever seeks jihad on the nipple is the one who strives to achieve his goals. Whoever sees in a dream that enemies are killed in jihad, it is nourishment and kindness. And whoever follows the path of jihad in a dream, this indicates goodness and the path to guidance. Whoever dreams of being killed in jihad will be happy and rejoicing. Interpretation of a dream about jihad According to Al-Nabulsi, seeing someone in a dream trying to achieve this for the sake of God indicates the scope of this livelihood. Seeing someone in a dream fighting and getting rid of infidels is evidence of plunder and victory over enemies. Seeing someone emerging from invaders is a sign that he is walking on the path of goodness and going to God. If one dreams that he is going to God, then this vision is a sign of the good and great position that the pioneer will have. Seeing someone participating in the opening up of countries, this indicates changing his life for the better and opening up to the world in the life of the visionary. Jihad in a dream can be an indicator To provide sustenance and kindness. Interpretation of a dream about jihad for a man. A man who dreams of fighting and jihad is one who cuts ties with one another. By seeing a person going out for jihad and defeating enemies, he will attain a great victory and get rid of the enemies present in his life. And whoever believes that he has been victorious in jihad and conquest, it is a sign of achieving goals. Vision A man in a dream fights for the sake of God, fights in the affairs of his life, and obtains a living. If he sees that he fought jihad and fled the battle, this is evidence of his irresponsibility. Interpretation of a dream about jihad for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she was killed in combat, she will be happy and happy. If she sees people They go out for jihad, as this is a sign of their victory and freedom from enemies. Interpretation of a dream about jihad for single people. If a girl believes that she is fighting infidels and polytheists, this indicates that she is religious and based on the commandments of God. Seeing victory over infidels indicates that she has achieved her desires and success in her life. Jihad can indicate Her marriage to a man of courage, strength, and noble characteristics. Seeing defeat in war and jihad may indicate some failures in her life and obstacles in her path.

title: Interpretation of something coming out of my nose in a dream: I dreamed that something came out of my nose in a dream

preview.html: Seeing something coming out of the mouth that we see in different forms, such as the secretion of green mucus or a yellow, white or black liquid, the discharge of flies, contaminated blood, smoke, thread, hair, ropes, worms, and pus for the unmarried woman, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, For the man, by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and more detailed interpretations in the appendix to the topic below. Interpretation of something coming out of the nose in a dream: The girl who sees that mucus is coming out of her nose forcefully, this is her interpretation of the ease of searching and spending. Every liquid or substance that comes out of the nose represents money except blood. Whoever sees a fly or Something similar coming out of his nose indicates that a child will be born to him. Whoever dreams: that mucus is coming out of his nose, then this indicates that he will benefit from it, Glory be to Him. And whoever sees: that he said at an intersection that blood came out of my nose, then this is an incident of money, and if he says that it came out, then the money is gone. Whoever dreams: that an animal or a bird comes out of his nose, this indicates that if he has an animal, he will give birth. Whoever sees that he stepped on the ground, a daughter will be born to him. Whoever sees: that he stepped on and an animal or bird came out of his nose, he struck a boy on both sides of what that bird attributed to him. If a cat comes out of his nose, it is a boy and a boy. A thief, and if it is a dove, then it is a crazy girl, and the mucus is a warning of an illness or his illness. Whoever dreams: that he clings, and what he hates comes out of him, then he is a boy with no good in him, and if he is loved, then the suitable boy is fair. Whoever dreams: he has a nosebleed and blood pours on If you dream of a bleeding nose, this means that a catastrophe will happen to the person who sees the dream. Whoever sees blood flowing from his nose and believes that the blood will benefit him well, indicates that the dreamer will gain a benefit or be harmed by the president’s money. Or from a high-ranking person. Whoever sees in a dream that someone hits him on the nose and makes him bleed, this indicates that the enemy is waiting for the fortuneteller to bring him conspiracies, harm, and damage. Hair that comes out of the nose indicates that harm is coming out for you, so perhaps magic or fatigue will leave you. Threads coming out Or hair is one of the disturbing dreams and its interpretation is mainly related to the psychological state of the viewer, as well as whether the thread or hair has come out completely or part of it remains, with the exception of the color of the thread. Seeing hair or thread coming out in a dream means a long life. Hair or thread coming out of the mouth is interpreted as Removing stress and recovering from whatever discomfort or envy the dreamer may have experienced. In the event that it is not possible to remove it from the mouth or remove only part of it, the injury must be removed. Whoever dreams that a mouse has come out of his nose or from his penis, then he will have a bad daughter, and this It will not benefit her, and if it comes out of his back, a woman will come out of it. There is no good in it. Whoever dreams of thick blood coming out of his nose if his wife is pregnant, this indicates a miscarriage of the fetus. Whoever dreams of blood coming out of the nose of someone he knows, this indicates great calamity or distress that befalls the person whose nose is bleeding. Whoever dreams: that nasal dirt may It increased, then he hated it, and if he sees that he has cleansed it, then it is upon him. Seeing a mucous crust on the nose indicates problems and administrative obstacles. Whoever sees in a dream his nose being cut off and flies or something similar coming out of it.

title: The story of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of dreams

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn SirinDreams have a special science for their interpretation. Visions and dreams refer to the Islamic religion, and it turns out that seeing them in a dream can have a specific meaning or a message conveyed to the dreamer, and there are many. Famous interpretation scholars in the interpretation of dreams, including the great Imam Ibn Sirin, who presented all the interpretations related to most of the dreams that we may see, so we learn through the various website, the interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin. Who is Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin is Abu Bakr Muhammad ibn Sirin Al-Basri, one of the major imams in hadith and jurisprudence. Interpretation and interpretation of the vision. Ibn Sirin was born in the succession of his companion Othman bin Affan around the year 33 AH. Abdullah bin Al-Zubayr, as he was famous for his piety and knowledge, Muhammad bin Sirin died at the age of seventy-seven in the year 110 AH. How did Ibn Shirin become an interpreter of visions? When Ibn Sirin was asked about his ability to interpret dreams, he answered that when he reached the age of eight, he had memorized the entire Holy Quran, When he was eleven years old, he saw in a dream our Master Joseph, peace be upon him. for him. Peace and blessings be upon him, so he opened his mouth and said: O Ibn Sirin, what do you see? Ibn Sirin said: I see your mouth, so Joseph, peace be upon him, asked him: What is in it? He answered with your tongue and said to him: Look, Ibn Sirin. He replied: “I see you.” Light energy, as if I saw your heart.” Ibn Sirin: Every time someone narrated his vision to me, it was as if I saw his interpretation written on my palm. Examples of Ibn Sirin’s dream interpretation: Ibn Sirin was famous for his great knowledge, religion, and piety, and he was famous for his ability to interpret dreams, as he used to hear dreams from his companion, look at his face, and give him his interpretation of his vision. I called for prayer among the people, and Ibn Sirin looked at his face and interpreted to him his dream that he would perform Hajj to the Sacred House of God this year, citing in his interpretation the words of God Almighty. (And announce the Hajj to the people. They will come to you on men, and to every trickle they will come from every deep valley.) After that, the people asked him about the reason for the difference in His interpretation of the two men, he said that when he looked at the face of the first, he saw features of righteousness in it, while the second did not see in his face the features of legitimacy. He taught, pious, and memorized his noble book, and there are many miracles in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of dreams, which proved his ability to interpret dreams. title: What is the interpretation of seeing frogs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Frogs in a dream Frogs are creatures that people do not like and do not prefer to encounter or see in reality. What are their different meanings in a dream? Interpretation of seeing frogs in a dream. What is the interpretation of frogs in a dream? Some dream interpreters claim that seeing frogs in a dream is one of those visions that heralds It is good at times, but it shows the dreamer that he will be exposed to pressure and harm at other times. A pregnant woman who sees a frog in her dream is a happy dream, especially if this frog is green, because it indicates that the birth will be easy and will be natural, God willing. As for the unmarried woman who She sees a black frog, it is one of the bad things that predicts the presence of a naughty man in her life and she must be very careful of him. What is the interpretation of frogs in Al-Osaimi’s dream? Imam Al-Osaimi believes that if a frog appears in a married woman’s dream, this means that there is a problem in this woman’s life and she is trying to Hiding them and not showing them to people. As for a man seeing frogs, it indicates that he has multiple relationships with girls, which will harm his reputation if the matter is revealed. This vision comes as a warning from God. If someone sees frog eggs in a dream, this indicates the presence of a large number of opportunities in that person’s life. The person must use them correctly and not let his opportunities go to waste. What is the interpretation of frogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin confirms that a frog in a dream is a person who wants to worship God Almighty, the Best of servants, and does not care about worldly matters. Seeing frogs in a dream means that the dreamer He has good relationships with his family, family and friends and everyone loves to see him and go out with him. Moreover, talking to this person puts people at ease. As for catching frogs in a dream, it is not a good vision because it shows the extent of the injustice that the dreamer is suffering from in his life and the resulting harm. A great psychological sign. If a person sees that he is trying to catch a frog in his dream, this confirms that he is dealing with a good and righteous person in his normal life and he must approach this person because it will benefit him. The person who sees himself eating a frog in a dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams that explain Direct benefits to the person, and this benefit may come from his family or friends, as well as from his neighbors. I know more than 2000 interpretations of Ibn Sirin, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, from Google. What is the interpretation of frogs in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream? Imam Al-Sadiq believes that the presence of frogs inside the dreamer’s house in his dream indicates bad conditions. The materialism of the people of that house indicates their poverty. If a married woman sees that there is a frog trying to attack her, this indicates that there is another woman in this woman’s life who is trying to harm her and keep her away from her husband. Imam Al-Sadiq confirms that seeing a pregnant woman carrying frog eggs in a dream means that she will give birth. Twins, and God knows best. Seeing frogs may indicate the presence of evil in the dreamer’s life and the attempt of some to ruin his affairs with magic and evil, so he seeks help from God and asks for help. If a person sees that he is talking to frogs in a dream, this indicates that benefit and sustenance will come from the dreamer. Frogs

Seeing someone getting rid of a thief who broke into his house in a dream is a sign To get rid of worries, problems, debts, and sorrows in one’s life. The thief took things from the dreamer’s home, and escaping could be a sign of a chronic illness that afflicts the fortuneteller. Seeing the thief escaping after getting things indicates worry, sadness, and anguish that will afflict the fortuneteller. Whoever sees that he caught the thief and killed him, in reality it is an indication of relief from sorrows.
